resources.string: Empatica E4 collects heart rate, blood volume pulse and acceleration, and electrodermal activity. Connect an Empatica E4 by pressing the power-button. It needs Bluetooth and location permissions to communicate efficiently. The location permission is not used to find your location.
Empatica E4 failed. Please enable internet and bluetooth and restart the Empatica plugin or this app.
Empatica has been disconnected. Please reconnect it.
